title: Exfoliating Body Scrub for Keratosis Pilaris
description: Reduce the appearance of skin bumps quickly with this fast-acting body scrub. Made with 10% Glycolic and Lactic Acids to loosen the skin's top layer and decongest pores, while Pumice Buffing Beads sweep away dry, rough bumps to reveal healthier looking skin that feels exceptionally smooth. Free from drying alcohols, artificial colorants, artificial fragrance, lanolin, mineral oil, parabens, petrolatum, phthalates, propylene glycol, sulfates, talc, formaldehydes, oxybenzone, coal tar, triclocarbon, and ethanol. Dermatologist tested, vegan and cruelty-free, gluten-free, nut-free, oil-free, soy-free, silicone-free, safe for sensitive skin, and nano-free.

title: Oral-B Pro 1000 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
description: Get a superior clean with Oral-B's dentist-inspired round brush head technology that removes up to 100% more plaque* compared to a manual toothbrush. Protect your gums with the Sensi Cleaning mode and Gum Pressure Control that automatically stops brush pulsations when brushing too hard. Maximize cleaning performance with 3 easy-to-use cleaning modes and a handle-integrated quadrant timer that alerts you every 30 seconds to change brushing zone. Personalize your clean with Oral-B brush heads available for purchase for individual needs such as deep clean, gentle clean, and whitening. Reach those hard-to-clean areas with the round brush head that rectangular manual brushes can't. Experience a better clean from the #1 brand most used by dentists worldwide.

title: Xhoon 24K Gold Under Eye Patches - 20 Pairs
description: Get ready to look your best with Xhoon 24K Gold Under Eye Patches. Infused with a blend of collagen, 24k gold hyaluronic acids and a variety of natural plant extracts, these eye patches help to deeply repair the skin, soothe, rejuvenate and protect the delicate skin around your eyes. Easy to apply and mess free, these eye patches will help to improve dark circles and tired eye area, making it look radiant and healthy. Enjoy long-lasting moisturizing effect with these eye patches and feel confident and refreshed.

title: 5-Piece Face Mask Skin Care Set for Deep Pore Cleansing
description: Refresh and rejuvenate your skin with this 5-piece face mask set! Includes a Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask, Dead Sea Mud Mask, Rose Clay Mask, Face Mask Brush Applicator, and a Coral Velvet Hairband. Each mask is formulated with natural ingredients to suit all skin types, from oily, dry, and extra sensitive. The Dead Sea Mud Mask helps to cleanse skin pores and create a gentle exfoliation effect, while the Turmeric Vitamin C Clay Mask helps to lighten dark spots, reduce blemishes, and smooth out fine lines. The Rose Clay Mask helps to improve acne prone skin, creating a smoother and cleaner complexion. Use this set 3 times a week to get cleaner and smoother skin!

title: Organic Cotton Rounds - Biodegradable, Chemical-Free, For Sensitive Skin
description: 100% organic certified cotton rounds ideal for personal care, cosmetics, and more. Both the cotton rounds and the packaging are made with renewable and sustainable raw materials, all of which are biodegradable and compostable. High-quality rounds with the structural integrity you would expect from German engineering. Can also be used for craft projects and other uses.

title: Shea Butter Shave Cream with Pomegranate and Raspberry
description: Get incredibly smooth skin with this shea butter shave cream. Packed with natural shea butter and oil, it helps keep your skin hydrated and beautiful. Vitamin C and Vitamin E support healthy skin, and aloe helps condition and nourish. Enjoy the fragrant notes of sweet pomegranate, tart raspberries and watery lotus blossom. This shave cream can be used wet or dry and helps prevent nicks and cuts. Formulated without parabens or phthalates, and gluten free.

title: BAIMEI Jade Roller & Gua Sha Face Roller Set
description: Get the perfect spa-like experience with this BAIMEI Jade Roller & Gua Sha Face Roller Set! This set includes a jade face roller and a gua sha tool, both crafted from rose quartz for a luxurious feel. The face roller helps to reduce puffiness and firm your skin, while the gua sha tool lifts your skin and improves fine lines. Keep the tools in the fridge for an extra cooling effect! Get the perfect spa-like experience with this BAIMEI Jade Roller & Gua Sha Face Roller Set!

title: Dove Nourishing Body Care Cream for Extra Dry Skin
description: Get velvety-soft skin with the Dove Nourishing Body Care Cream. This rich and creamy formula is deeply hydrating, quickly absorbed, and non-greasy, leaving dry skin beautifully smooth and nourished. It contains a blend of natural skin nutrients and provides 48-hour moisturization. Perfect for daily dry skin care, especially for heels, knees, elbows, and other areas prone to dryness.

title: Multipurpose Exfoliating Dermaplaning Tool
description: Safely and gently removes facial hair, dead skin, and unwanted peach fuzz. Microguard blade to protect skin and shape eyebrows. Ergonomic, lightweight design for easy and comfortable use. Includes blade cover for added protection. Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase.

title: Green Tea Mask Stick for Face Skin Care and Blackhead Removal
description: Get deep clean skin with this green tea mask stick! It contains 100% natural ingredients and is suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin. This mask stick is easy to use and portable, making it perfect for travel and everyday use. The rotating head design ensures a mess-free application. Apply a proper amount of the mask cream evenly on your face, wait for 10-15 minutes, then wipe the facial mask with a towel and rinse with water. Enjoy a clean and moisturized face with this green tea mask stick!

title: Honest Beauty Tinted Lip Balm | Moisturizing Acai Extracts + Avocado Oil
description: Get soft and kissable lips with our tinted lip balm! Infused with antioxidant-rich Acai Extracts and Avocado Oil, this vegan lip balm helps keep your lips moisturized and hydrated all day. Swipe on for a sheer tint that locks in hydration. Free of petrolatum, paraffins, parabens, synthetic fragrances, silicones, and mineral oil. EWG Certified, dermatologist tested, and physician tested. Cruelty free and vegan.

title: ZIZZON Professional Manicure and Pedicure Kit
description: Get the perfect manicure and pedicure with the ZIZZON Professional Manicure and Pedicure Kit. This 12-piece set includes all the essential tools for your grooming needs, such as nail clippers, multi-purpose scissors, cuticle trimmers, ear picks, tweezers, peeling knives, and more. The set is lightweight and comes with a stylish and secure travel case, perfect for taking with you on the go. It also makes a great gift for any woman or girl in your life. Get the perfect manicure and pedicure with the ZIZZON Professional Manicure and Pedicure Kit.

title: Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up Exfoliating Dermaplaning Tool
description: Get a smooth and flawless complexion with the Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up Exfoliating Dermaplaning Tool. This versatile beauty tool helps shape eyebrows, remove fine hairs and even smooth skin by gently exfoliating. It features a precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping and its unique fine micro-guards help protect your skin from nicks and irritation. Its slim and portable size allows for last-minute touch-ups on the go. Plus, it can be recycled using Schick's mail back program.

title: Aromatherapy Shower Steamers - 15 Pack
description: Enjoy a luxurious spa experience in the comfort of your own home with these aromatherapy shower steamers. With five exotic and tantalizing fruity scents, each steamer will transport you to a tropical paradise. Place one tablet on the shower floor, away from the direct water stream, and let the steam and fragrance fill the room. Perfect for any occasion, these steamers make a thoughtful gift for your loved ones.

title: Gold Eye Mask Under Eye Patches - Collagen Masks for Face, Dark Circles and Puffiness
description: Adofect Gold Eye Mask Under Eye Patches are designed to reduce wrinkles, puffiness, dark circles and fine lines. Formulated with Power Crystal Gel Collagen, it stimulates and regenerates skin cells, dramatically elevating your own skin's collagen production ability. With regular use, this product can help restore elasticity and firmness to your skin, and reduce the appearance of bags and dark circles under your eyes. Suitable for home use hot or cold.

title: BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask - Hydrating & Anti-Aging
description: Get ready to say goodbye to dark circles and tired-looking eyes with our BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask! Infused with natural ingredients, this eye mask helps to provide long-lasting hydration and reduce wrinkles, fine lines, and puffiness. It also helps to brighten and refresh the delicate skin under your eyes, giving you a firmer and more youthful appearance. Our eye mask is easy to use and can be applied in just a few simple steps. Plus, its non-slip grid design allows you to move around and work while using it. Get your BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask today and achieve a refreshed and youthful look!

title: Billie Body Buffer Pre-Shave Exfoliating Bar
description: Get a smooth and close shave with the Billie Body Buffer Pre-Shave Exfoliating Bar. This exfoliating bar is made with eco-friendly jojoba and castor oil beads to buff away bumps and roughness. Aloe and shea butter keep your skin hydrated and nourished, while a nourishing oil blend provides extra protection. Dermatologist approved for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Vegan, cruelty-free, sulfate-free, and paraben-free.

title: Luxurious Spa Gift Basket for Women - Rose Scented Bath and Body Kit
description: Pamper and indulge the special lady in your life with this luxurious spa gift basket. This spa bath kit includes essential oils, body butter, hand cream, rose soap, bath bombs, soy candles, and a coffee mug. Infused with a romantic rose fragrance to rejuvenate and relax, this spa set is enriched with pure rose essential oils and nourishing Vitamin E to help soothe and relieve sunburnt areas, even skin tone, and diminish age spots. This is the perfect gift for birthdays, holidays, anniversaries, Mother's Day, and Valentine's Day.

title: Bio-Oil Skincare Body Oil for Scars, Stretch Marks, Uneven Skin Tone
description: Get the nourishing hydration your skin needs with Bio-Oil Skincare Oil. This unique and non-greasy body oil is clinically proven to help improve the appearance of scars, stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Formulated with natural oils, including Vitamin E to help maintain healthy looking skin, and calming Chamomile and Lavender Oil to soothe. Suitable for all skin types, tones, and textures, and safe for use on both face and body without clogging pores. Vegan friendly, paraben free, cruelty free, and 100% recyclable.

title: BREYLEE Pink Rose Eye Mask – 30 Pairs
description: Hydrate and moisturize your skin with BREYLEE Pink Rose Eye Mask. This under eye mask contains Amino Acid and Collagen to reduce eye bags, dark circles, wrinkles, fine lines, and puffiness. Improve your skin’s elasticity and hydration with this easy to use eye mask. It is designed with a grid to prevent slipping off and to save time. Keep it on for 20 minutes and enjoy the refreshing and younger-looking skin.
